text:
Rio Ferdinand Credit: pa Former Manchester United star Rio Ferdinand says he still hasn't grieved properly about the death of his wife. His wife Rebecca died aged 34, in 2015, after a battle with breast cancer. Now Rio is fronting a TV documentary looking at the impact on parents who lose partners.
Rio with his wife Rebecca in 2013 Credit: pa In the programme - to be shown later this year, the former England captain discovers the only way parents can help their children move on is by rebuilding their own lives.
